articles.description: Critical reviews have been mixed for the first feature from Skydance Animation.
articles.content:
To put it in measurable terms, early scores ahead of the films release include a 47% mark on Rotten Tomatoes and a 50 on Metacritic. Heres what the critics are saying:

articles.title: Is this proof Rebekah Vardy bullied Iain Lee on I'm A Celebrity? - Daily Mail
articles.description: The WAG, 40, denied on Wednesday that she bullied Iain, 46, when they appeared on I'm A Celebrity in 2017, and after he hit back, incidents between the pair have resurfaced.
articles.content:
Rebekah Vardy has once again denied claims that she bullied Iain Lee when they appeared on I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here! in 2017.
